title: Some COLLADA textures are invisible since pull request #2536

content.html:
Try inserting the "Fire Station" model for example, it will be inserted but its visuals are invisible. Another one is ARIAC's workcell.

I was able to fix this with the following patch, but I'm sure this must have unintended consequences.

diff -r c9aa7a121d3b gazebo/rendering/Material.cc
--- a/gazebo/rendering/Material.cc  Sun Jan 08 23:50:54 2017 -0800
+++ b/gazebo/rendering/Material.cc  Mon Jan 09 09:58:31 2017 -0800
@@ -155,14 +155,10 @@
   common::Color diffuse =  _mat->GetDiffuse();
   common::Color specular = _mat->GetSpecular();
   common::Color emissive = _mat->GetEmissive();
-  float transparency = _mat->GetTransparency();

-  // use transparency value if specified otherwise use diffuse alpha value
-  double alpha = transparency > 0 ? 1.0 - transparency : diffuse.a;
-  diffuse.a = alpha;
   pass->setDiffuse(diffuse.r, diffuse.g, diffuse.b, diffuse.a);
   pass->setAmbient(ambient.r, ambient.g, ambient.b);
   pass->setDepthWriteEnabled(_mat->GetDepthWrite());
